structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: The district is authorized to enter into negotiations with the federal government and the Commonwealth of Kentucky, or either of them, or the agencies of both or either, and apply and obtain from them or either or both of them, any and all grants-in-aid that may be available.
